remarks: Epsilon induction scheme without Infinity.  See comments at ~ setindtr .  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Oct-2014.)
statement:
setindtrs.a $e |- ( A. y e. x ps -> ph ) $.
setindtrs.b $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
setindtrs.c $e |- ( x = B -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
setindtrs $p |- ( E. z ( Tr z /\ B e. z ) -> ch ) $.
$d B x z $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph y $.
$d ph z $.
$d ps x $.
$d x y $.
